blocks.content:
## Welcome to my slice of the web.

Here you can find my latest blog posts, thoughts and journey of how I've gotten where I am today.

### This site was built using [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.org) and [TinaCMS](https://www.tinacms.org) and is hosted on [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com).

Both of which are super awesome you should check them out!.  The code is available to download and fork to your heart's content.  Check it out here: [https://github.com/xaviemirmon/xavier-developer-site](https://github.com/xaviemirmon/xavier-developer-site "https://github.com/xaviemirmon/xavier-developer-site")
